attributes.action: do not put calories on menus
attributes.additional_details: an increase in eating disorders will not only put the country at more risk and make us much less healthy it will also be highly damaging to the NHS with such a high amount of cases and damaging to business as less people will choose to visit to protect their own mental health and physical health
attributes.background: boris has recently said that he will be putting calories of items on menus. THIS CAN NOT HAPPEN as it will hugely encourage and worsen eating disorders. as well as start them and make ppl in recovery relapse
